name: Ext_R3_Consent_source
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Consent.source[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.source[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Source from which this consent is taken
element.definition: The source on which this consent statement is based. The source might be a scanned original paper form, or a reference to a consent that links back to such a source, a reference to a document repository (e.g. XDS) that stores the original consent document.
element.comment: `Consent.source[x]` maps to R4B `Consent.source[x]`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `Consent.source[x]` maps to R4B `Consent.source[x]`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
